panels.description: [$interval] Completed disk bytes for selected device
panels.title: Disk Bytes

targets.expr: count by (device) (irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{network="$network", nick=~"$node"}[$__rate_interval])) - sum by (device) (irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{network="$network", nick=~"$node"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Mempool Size
